file_insights.module_purpose: Implement numerically stable running statistics using Welford's algorithm

patterns_discovered: Welford's online algorithm for numerically stable mean and variance computation
Single-pass statistical computation to reduce memory bandwidth
Handling of NaN values in statistical calculations
Generics and trait-based implementation for numeric types
gotchas_discovered: Potential floating-point precision errors in variance calculations
Need for careful handling of edge cases like single-value and zero-value scenarios
Converting between usize and numeric types requires careful conversion
recommendations: Use population variance and sample variance methods based on specific statistical needs
Implement extensive unit tests to cover edge cases
Potentially add performance benchmarks to validate numerical stability claims
